item.description:
One of the things that makes us so good a group is to find a reason on a nice day to go flying together..

Well, Looks like Wednesday might be a wash... I'm off tonight for some fried clams (or a lobster roll, but they do have those nice pepper rings too... or maybe an ice cream)... hhmmmmm, whatever...

WX today looks awesome.... Anyone wanna join me to AFN or someplace else?
Any other ideas, send em along to us all.. Otherwise... a small flight for food is better than sitting home watching the planes go by..

WILL FLY FOR FOOD!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Impromptu FPA Fly Out For Fried Clams :-)
